etymology.interpretation: 高麗(高麗) (gāolí) refers to the Goryeo dynasty, a historical Korean kingdom lasting from 918 to 1392. The name is derived from 고구려(Goguryeo), one of the Three Kingdoms of Korea, and was adopted as a mark of pride and distinctiveness. 高(高) (gāo, "high") and 麗(麗) (lí, "beautiful") highlight the elevated and beautiful nature attributed to the kingdom.

examples.chinese: 高麗拥有丰富的文化遗产(高麗擁有豐富的文化遺產)。
examples.pinyin: Gāolí yǒngyǒu fēngfù de wénhuà yíchǎn.
examples.english: Goryeo had a rich cultural heritage.

examples.chinese: 学者研究高麗历史(學者研究高麗歷史)，揭示其独特魅力(揭示其獨特魅力)。
examples.pinyin: Xuézhě yánjiū Gāolí lìshǐ, jiēshì qí dútè mèilì.
examples.english: Scholars study Goryeo history, revealing its unique charm.

examples.chinese: 高麗时期曾是文化交流的中心(高麗時期曾是文化交流的中心)。
examples.pinyin: Gāolí shíqī céng shì wénhuà jiāoliú de zhōngxīn.
examples.english: During the Goryeo period, it was a center of cultural exchange.
